about_the_game:
IT'S A RITE OF PASSAGE.

Step into the ultimate built-for-VR magical combat experience where each battle is a test of skill, magical creativity, and perseverance, from the veteran indie studio behind FORM and Twilight Path!

Designed for those who crave intense combat and relentless real-world physical gameplay. Every spell, every motion, every decision will mean the difference between victory and another hard-earned lesson. Prepare to die…a lot.

TIME IS YOUR WEAPON

Master the art of HexTime to outmaneuver your enemies. Slow down the chaos around you, anticipate attacks, and strike with unparalleled precision. Time manipulation isn’t just a feature—it’s your key to survival.

YOU HAVE ALL THE POWER YOU NEED...BUT CAN YOU WIELD IT?

It’ll take more than a few button presses to face a dozen axes hurtling toward your head..and come out breathing. In HexWind you ARE a master of the elements - but can you master your own physical limitations to fully step into your avatar’s shoes?

UNLESH MAGICAL MAYHEM TO AN ORIGINAL HEAVY METAL SOUNDTRACK

Catch that perfect combat rhythm as you lay waste to hordes of enemies to the adrenaline-pumping beats of an original Metal soundtrack.

THINK YOU CAN SURVIVE THE CHAOS?

In HexWind, survival isn’t guaranteed—it’s earned. Dive into an ethereal dimension of chaos and metal, and flex every magical muscle to battle your way out.

Join Us in Early Access and Shape the Journey!

Become a part of the HexWind story from the very beginning. As an Early Access participant, you’ll receive regular updates packed with new content, features, and enhancements.

Our full roadmap lays out our ambitious plan to expand the game’s world, abilities, and challenges—all influenced by feedback from players like you.

  • Regular Content Drops: New spells, procedurally generated environments, enemies, collectibles and dungeons to keep the adventure fresh.

  • Community-Driven Development: Your feedback directly impacts game improvements and additions.

  • Exclusive Insider Access: Get sneak peeks at upcoming features and participate in special events.

Are you ready to battle your way out of this arcane world?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR (Quest, Rift, Index, Vive, WMR)
